name: Vornado Realty Trust
description: Vornado Realty Trust is a publicly traded real estate investment trust (REIT) based in New York City, specializing in the ownership, management, and development of commercial real estate. Founded in 1982, Vornado is one of the largest owners of office and retail properties in the United States, primarily focusing on Manhattan and Washington, D.C. The company’s portfolio includes iconic properties such as the Morgan Stanley Building, 1290 Avenue of the Americas, and the Hotel Pennsylvania. Vornado is known for its strategic acquisitions and developments, as well as its commitment to sustainability and innovative design in its projects. The company aims to enhance the value of its properties through active management and redevelopment initiatives, ensuring that its spaces meet the evolving needs of tenants and customers. With a focus on high-quality assets and prime locations, Vornado Realty Trust continues to play a key role in the urban landscape, contributing to the growth and vitality of the commercial real estate market.

seo.meta_title: Vornado Realty Trust | Leading Real Estate Investment Trust
seo.meta_description: Explore Vornado Realty Trust, a premier REIT focusing on prime commercial real estate in New York City and Washington, D.C. Discover their iconic properties and commitment to sustainability.

faq.question: What does Vornado Realty Trust do?
faq.answer: Vornado Realty Trust owns, manages, and develops commercial real estate properties, primarily in Manhattan and Washington, D.C.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of Vornado Realty Trust?
faq.answer: Steven Roth is the CEO of Vornado Realty Trust.

faq.question: Where is Vornado headquartered?
faq.answer: Vornado is headquartered in New York, New York, USA.

faq.question: What types of properties does Vornado own?
faq.answer: Vornado owns office and retail properties, including iconic buildings in major urban centers.

faq.question: When was Vornado Realty Trust founded?
faq.answer: Vornado Realty Trust was founded in 1982.
